front.title: IEEE Standard for Bar Coding for Distribution Transformers

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This IEEE Standards product is part of the C57 family on Power Distribution and Regulating Transformers. This standard sets forth bar code label requirements for overhead, padmounted, and underground-type distribution transformers. Included herein are requirements for data content, symbology, label layout, print quality, and label life expectancy.
